It\xe2\x80\x99s all about just you and your games and movies . You should feel you own the products that you buy - just like a book , or a DVD.On GOG.com , no matter if you are online or offline , you will never be locked away from your purchases.Everyone should be treated fairly and not overpay for purchases just because they reside in a different part of the world.If a product on GOG.com costs more in your country than the price in the US , we will make up the difference in value out of our own pockets , and offer it to you as free Wallet funds that you can use towards any future purchase.Whenever you buy something and it does n't work , you should feel safe knowing that you can take it back.We do n't understand why games or movies should be any different , so if your purchase does n't work and we ca n't help you fix it , you get your money back.Our Money Back Guarantee covers you for 30 days.DRM-Free ContentYou buy it - it\xe2\x80\x99s yoursFair Price PackageBecause $ 1 is not \xe2\x82\xac1Money-back guaranteeIt works , we guarantee it\n HEADLINES\nThe Monstrous Winter Sale Finale\n an hour ago\n - 621 comments Deals up to 90 % off | 18 new games available on GOG Connect .
